sections.TOP: Yaros026327texs7ygzefeuqqf12a8gm0yjhzjvl7b1786322015-03-22T19:26:52ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */'''Yaros''' is a small island in [[Slaver's Bay]], located just off the coast southwest from [[Yunkai]], though it is apparently the largest island in Slaver's Bay itself (which is bounded to the west by the large Isle of Cedars). Yaros lies directly between Yunkai and Astapor.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Yaros is much the same. The island is located north of Astapor and southwest of Yunkai.
sections.History:
===[[Season 4]]===

Yaros is marked on a map of Slaver's Bay that Ser [[Jorah Mormont]] is looking over.<ref>"[[The Mountain and the Viper]]"</ref>
